The video footage of PM Modi: s meeting with Dr Manmohan Singh from 2019 was circulated on social media and broadcasted by TV9 Bharatvarsh, a leading TV news channel.
TV9 Bharatvarsh later deleted their broa: 3. Dabang News, a local media organization from Madhya Pradesh, also published the video on YouTube with a similar narrative.
